para: OOF.Mesh.Boundary_Conditions.New creates a new named boundary condition in the given &mesh;.

The name parameter is the name that will be assigned to the boundary condition. All future operations on the boundary condition will refer to it by this name. The name must be unique among all of the boundary condition names in the mesh. If it is not unique, then <x> will be appended to it, where x is a suitable integer. If the name is , a name will be assigned automatically.
The condition parameter is the new boundary condition to which the name is being applied. It must be an instance of the class.
